Html:
I used your old version and today I download your latest version to replace the old one. I got a problem about ExpressionFactory. I use IDynamicExpression and ExpressionFactory. I think, ExpressionFactory was removed. So, I want to know that how can I do. Because your demo source code do not use DynamicExpression.

Thank you very much in advance.

Dusit

From http://flee.codeplex.com/Release/ProjectReleases.aspx?ReleaseId=19246

Got rid of ExpressionFactory type; use ExpressionContext.Compile method to create expressions
